tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_tracking_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE weather_information (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE combined_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_tracking_data (
  satellite_id INT,
  satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
  tracking_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location_latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  location_longitude DECIMAL(10, 6)
)

CREATE TABLE weather_information (
  weather_id INT,
  weather_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location_latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  location_longitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  temperature DECIMAL(5, 2),
  humidity DECIMAL(5, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE combined_data (
  satellite_id INT,
  satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
  tracking_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location_latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  location_longitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  weather_id INT,
  weather_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature DECIMAL(5, 2),
  humidity DECIMAL(5, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE satellite_weather_join (
  satellite_id INT,
  satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
  tracking_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location_latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  location_longitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  weather_id INT,
  weather_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature DECIMAL(5, 2),
  humidity DECIMAL(5, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE combined_data (
    satellite_id INT,
    location VARCHAR,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
